title: what happened this free rotation
body: So yesturday I saw the free rotation it had aatrox{{champion:266}}, annie{{champion:1}}, jhin{{champion:202}}, kog'maw{{champion:96}}, leona{{champion:89}}, riven{{champion:92}}, soraka{{champion:16}}, warwick{{champion:19}} , zac{{champion:154}}, and zed{{champion:238}}  however when I logged on and checked the free rotation it was normal, but instead of leona{{champion:89}}  poppy{{champion:78}}  was on free rotation what the heck riot how did this slip though.

replies.body: Hey good call, it does look like Poppy is on the free rotation instead of Leona.  I'll pass this info on to see what's going on.  Thanks for the heads up!
